page.title: 17Organisations in Clun
page.content: {Youth Club:}is for children of 8-16 in two groups 8-11 and 11-16. Its purpose is to have fun.They meet on Wednesdays from 6-7pm and 7-9pm. {Play School:}is for children under statutory school age. They meet in an old school building twice a week from 1 to 3 o'clock. {Badminton Club:}is for people over the age of eleven. Its purpose is recreation. They meet on Mondays, Tuesdays and Thursdays. {Bowling Club:}meets on the bowling green on Saturday and sometimes Wednesday.They play Crown Green rules. {Choral Society:}is for adult singers. They meet in the chapel schoolroom on Thursdays from September till Easter. {Football Club:}plays in the Mid-Wales League (South). {Clun Ladies:}is a social group for women in Clun.
